name: Aliens And elevators
description:
Aliens&Elevators is a fast paced arcade styled minigame.You take the role of "JUN" a combat android who is tasked to to guide as many customers as possible to the correct floor of a cursed hotel within a time limit.Using the power of the mouse in your hand , defeat a variety of creatures that attempt to possess the lift and halt your progress!.

RequirementsOperating System : Windows
Other: Java ,JRE 1.80 and above
Controls: Mouse

Visit:http://pixelteriyaki.com/ for more games in the future!
